about_the_game:
Gensokyo, an isolated land separated by the Great Hakurei Barrier from the outside world.
A land where incidents occur occasionally and eventually solved.

In one regular night, a thief snuck into the Scarlet Devil Mansion.
No one ever predicted that this is a beginning of a new incident.

Play as Reimu


Reimu Hakurei (博麗 霊夢 Hakurei Reimu)
The shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine. She manages the Hakurei Border of Gensokyo and exterminates troublesome youkai.

Or Marisa


Marisa Kirisame (霧雨 魔理沙 Kirisame Marisa)
An ordinary human magician who specializes in light and heat magic. Currently resides in the Forest of Magic.

Gameplay and Features

ATB System, Spellcard, and Skill
Feel the heat of battle in Active Turn-Based battle system. The enemy won't let you stand idle in the midst of battle!
Player may use various spellcards and press all the buttons correctly for maximum damage.
Skills may be used to replace your default attack to deal different affinity and effects.

Placed Encounter and Dowsing
Player takes the lead, whether it's time to strike, retreat, be cautious, or be a tyrant who turns all the monsters into exp points without exception.
Or experience the ancient way of treasure hunting with the dowsing rod while dodging the enemies!

World of Gensokyo
Explore the World of Gensokyo with each character. Witness every incident and let the tale be carved as a memorable history!

Alchemy
Alchemy is a journey to create masterpiece. Create many kinds of item as you learn recipes along your journey!

This game is based off of Touhou Project by Team Shanghai Alice.
This game is developed by Dragon Emperors, and complies with the guidelines for releasing Touhou doujin games on Steam.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2 or newer
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: Oracle of Forgotten Testament is a Turn-based RPG Touhou fangame. Player will use characters from Touhou game to venture Gensokyo and resolve incidents.
